content.raw: `wamv_localization` won't be running in the simulation side. If this is something that your team needs, you should be running it in your container. Let me know if you plan to make any updates and we can wait until you're confident that your submission works as expected.
content.html: wamv_localization won't be running in the simulation side. If this is something that your team needs, you should be running it in your container. Let me know if you plan to make any updates and we can wait until you're confident that your submission works as expected.
